html:
10.8.22  12:27 pm   opinion on soft clothing?

      not soft enough

10.8.22  11:29 am   what's the newest thing you've learned?

      it's 7:44 pm

10.8.22  11:29 am   I loved your new video, did you have an inspiration for it?

     yes. imagine 2 characters somewhere, and then see what happens from there

     Also, what do you believe its message is?

      writing scenes with 2 characters can be fruitful

10.8.22  10:39 am   Why does only one restaurant serve food in Two Friends on the Beach

      because i thought it made for a good twist, after the previous line, which seems to make it sound like there might be a plentiful amount of restaurants

10.8.22  10:34 am   what inspired you to bring back the "no song" videos?

      it's very important to me

10.8.22  9:27 am   do the friends have names

      no, but your friends do

10.8.22  7:34 am   how to be cool

      first you'll wanna go ahead and take an envelope and put it inside another envelope

10.8.22  6:42 am   What is the bad thing you did?

      did a thing that was neither bad nor good

10.8.22  4:02 am   have you figured out the exact date of the writing session when you finished "2 friends on the beach"?

     it seems to be jan 24, 2022. everything after "dig a hole / true" was probably written on that day

     and also you said it would be about 3:09 long; where did the ambiguity come from, and how did it end up being 3:20 in the end?

     i assume i was going by the length of the temp vocal. so i must have forgot to account for the closing beach scene, after "ahhh". Also i probably didn't expect to send the camera out into the ocean

10.8.22  3:15 am   what do i do if i want to do a lot of different totally unrelated things and cannot develop the momentum to make progress on any one of them as a result?

      make some sort of pact with yourself where you will do things sequentially one at a time. hold a selecting ceremony each time where you choose which one to do next. put on some sacred music to heighten the mood

10.8.22  12:27 am   whats your favorite song

      i like them all equally

10.7.22  11:09 pm   what's your opinion on fish tanks

      they're pretty good

10.7.22  10:01 pm   Why do you wear soft clothing?

      in case it makes a cool song title

10.7.22  9:26 pm   at 0:41 of "2 friends on the beach" why do you have a 'bridge freezes before road surface' sign without a bridge with which to be paired with

      there is a bridge. you can see the car drive over it, immediately after turning left at the traffic light, to drive toward the camera. you can see the guard rails on the sides, and the color of the pavement is slightly different on this segment. this is a small bridge that goes over a river

10.7.22  9:08 pm   How long after "I'm a huge gamer most of the time" did those two guys become best buds?

     i don't know anything about them after the end of that video. although they seemed pretty inseparable from the start

      Also, is one still a huge gamer?

     i'm not sure

10.7.22  8:36 pm   Will everything be okay

      at some point

10.7.22  7:23 pm   Are the friends in your new video supposed to be a girl and a guy

     not specified

     or are the pink and blue colours over their head random colours?

      they're chosen based on the way the colors look

10.7.22  7:12 pm   is the friend going "ahhhhhh" at the end of your new video a representation of the audience's thoughts at that moment?

      hopefully

10.7.22  7:08 pm   when the purple-haired friend is talking about restaurants being different restaurants, is that a reference to unsolved paranormal mysteries of people seemingly getting displaced across parallel universes?

     no. but, how does someone even prove if that's happened?

      like a Mandela effect type thing?

     the mandela effect is a disgrace to Nelson Mandela, who dedicated his life to fighting for civil rights, and then his name becomes famous for people forgetting the difference between him and Steve Biko

      or is it more about quantum mechanics, with the restaurants being in kind of a quantum superposition until they are observed?

     it tries to bring some of that spirit to the conversation

10.7.22  6:49 pm   do you think you'll ever make a song or video that is directly connected to another song or video,

     sure, it happens sometimes. like "hello, i'm a piece of garbage" and "thanks for checking in, i'm still a piece of garbage". or, "just wrote a letter to myself and now i'm opening it", and "just opened the letter i wrote to myself and it says i'm a stupid idiot." or "history of japan", and "history of the entire world, i guess"

     like for example another video with the 2 friends or a song continuing the story of where i've been

      could happen

10.7.22  5:46 pm   are the 2 friends on the beach secret lovers?

      it's possible, but they also might be very open about it

10.7.22  5:28 pm   Is the guy from "more than a dream" and "if the world doesn't end" the waiter in "2 friends at the beach"?

      no. the waiter from '2 friends' has a slightly smaller head. however, the person from the scooter scene in "if the world doesn't end" is the same as the person in the scooter scene from "more than a dream", because the scooter scene was cut from "more than a dream" and re-purposed for "if the world doesn't end"

10.7.22  5:13 pm   do you like philosophy

      i don't know where the line is, between philosophy and non-philosophy

10.7.22  3:52 pm   What do you do when you see a rat

      stage a photograph with a slice of pizza. then get on the next flight to Hollywood

10.7.22  3:39 pm   have you ever wondered why the world isn't in 2d

      first i'd have to actually stop and wonder what d (dimension) even means. i thought i intuitively knew, but the question you raised reminds me i'm unable to define it

10.7.22  2:51 pm   i'm trying to make a "song gen" list of ideas. i've got a bunch of random titles that i basically said "that could be a good song title" and put it in a list, should i put those in the song gen list?

     yes, absolutely. 'title first' is great fun

     also inversely, i've also got musical ideas that don't have any lyrics or title, should i try to make up a title for them when putting them in the list?

     absolutely yes, that's a solid way to work. if you do it this way and also the other way you mentioned, you'll automatically get a nice range of different breeds. there's even some other combinations of games you can play here

      also also, how often do you combine multiple ideas from the list into one song,

     it's rare, and i never do it on purpose. occasionally 2 entries will collide, entirely by chance. kind of like running into someone you know, somewhere you never planned to meet them

      or totally remove ideas from the list?

      i usually don't remove anything. that's because i've discovered a fun game where i use the bad ideas as fuel for better ideas which may not resemble the first idea at all

10.7.22  2:47 pm   what feeling do you get when you finish a video?

      good

10.7.22  2:44 pm   Did someone say Jazz? 

      i don't recall

10.7.22  2:18 pm   do you have plans for a direct sequel to "2 friends on the beach" (featuring the same characters)?

      no

10.7.22  2:14 pm   Whats your favorite time signature?

      regular

10.7.22  12:12 pm   are the two people on the beach really just friends

      co-stars

10.7.22  11:55 am   Hi Bill. Do you find yourself learning by jumping straight into what you want to learn with no information rather than looking into guides/tutorials?

      sometimes

10.7.22  11:12 am   opinion on orange tabby cats?

     the only one i've heard of is Garfield, whom for various reasons i suspect is not really a cat

     they are motivated solely by food

10.7.22  11:09 am   what was your thought process when adding the singular corn that landed in the cup of water in your latest video?

      stone cold logic, and common sense

10.7.22  10:08 am   having an existential crisis rn

      priceless

10.7.22  10:05 am   ever interchanged an I and an l for anagram purposes

      no, that seems both improper and impractical, especially because they actually look different in many fonts. including the one i'm Iooking at right now

10.7.22  9:32 am   where can i find more "regular music" it sounds funky

      you never know where you're gonna find it. usually when music finds you, it is somehow paired up with some other scenario or situation. it can happen in movies. it can happen if you hear the song in a certain location. and for other reasons. or, sometimes, you just can't find any of the music you truly crave and in that case you may have to make it yourself

10.7.22  9:08 am   It looks like some of the dialogue in the script you put for 2 friends on the beach is different than in the video.

     the lines with "--" next to them were cut. considering that, everything seems just about identical

     Is this because you thought the scenes dragged out too long, or was it something else?

      there was no time limit on it. the only reason for changes here would be to make it better. actually there was another reason for some other changes you can't see, something that actually got changed twice. Just after "this is the only restaurant that still serves food", there was an opportunity there to jump into a small song bit i've had for a long time. However, i realized that i might not want to go there, so i also wrote a backup option, which is something else that happens in the room where their table is. Unfortunately i'm a complete idiot and forgot that they're actually on the roof, and this other bit is completely impossible on the roof. it's too bad i couldn't use that part because that was one of my favorite parts. that line was also written in the script with "--" next to it, but i removed it from the version i posted here, because i don't want to give away that bit. i will hopefully use it later

10.7.22  8:43 am   will you make more videos like 2 friends at the beach?

      yes

10.7.22  8:16 am   do you like music

      it's ok

10.7.22  7:43 am   But what IS the lobster section?

      i never found out

10.7.22  7:21 am   will we be seeing more of the 2 friends from "2 friends on the beach" in future videos?

      maybe not, but, knowing me you will probably see other characters that look and act a lot like them

10.7.22  6:13 am   would you have gone to the lobster section?

      no

10.7.22  5:50 am   When did you first get the idea for "2 friends on the beach"?

      august 6, 2020

10.7.22  5:36 am   in "2 friends on the beach", is one of the friends afraid of lobsters? because they couldn't handle the lobster section

      no one knows why that person was afraid of the lobster section at that time. no one even knows what the lobster section is. the first thing i was wondering is: is it a section where people eat lobsters, or, is it a section where lobsters can eat. i assumed i was going to have to decide this, but i was pleased to see that the script seems to play stronger if it's not shown

10.7.22  4:41 am   hey bill, what do you want from the lobster section?

      i suppose all i wanted was for it to be intriguing and mysterious. which i accidentally achieved, perhaps due to bad time management

10.7.22  4:21 am   Why did they fire door? and how is he going to get a job now??

      no one has fired door. it's being suggested to you, for you to do that. whether or not you will actually do it is something you must decide

10.7.22  3:52 am   Hey bill, I have a question I think you could answer. When you write a song are the words lyrics, or are the lyrics words? There's also the possibility that they're both lyrics and words at the same time.

     yes they are, and often more. that's one of the benefits that music allows

10.7.22  1:57 am   will the next video be a song or another skit?

      i believe it will be a non-song, of slightly shorter than average length

10.7.22  1:49 am   why did you choose ohio specifically for the "go somewhere" in "2 friends on the beach"?

     i was trying to figure that out too, when i was scouting for locations and i couldn't seem to find vibes i needed for the other scenes, especially the restaurant, anywhere in ohio. and i insisted on all 3 locations being plausibly contiguous, via car. so i began to wonder if the driving scene really has to be ohio because the other 2 scenes just don't seem to work in ohio

     was it just the first thing that came to mind?

     after some soul searching i was able to determine that i must have written 'ohio' in the script just as a shorthand description for what it looks like. i'm pretty sure i just meant farmlands. i was glad to realize this, because i really wasn't finding the cozy sort of place i'd imagined, for the restaurant, in ohio
